          <title>
            <string language="sl">Snežak</string>
            <string language="en">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Snowman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Snowman</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sneženega moža otroci radi izdelujejo pa, če je snega le še za vzorec.</string>
            <string language="en">Even when there is very little snow children like to build a snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sneg</string>
            <string language="en">snow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">snežak</string>
            <string language="en">snowman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">otrok</string>
            <string language="en">child</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Selbst wenn es sehr klein gibt, mögen 
Schneekinder einen Snowman aufbauen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Même lorsqu'il y a très petit les enfants de 
neige aiment construire un snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mesmo quando há muito pequeno as crianças da 
neve gostam de construir um snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anche quando ci è pochissimo i bambini della 
neve gradiscono costruire uno snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακόμα και όταν υπάρχει πολύ τα παιδιά λίγου χιονιού
επιθυμούν να χτίσουν έναν snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Incluso cuando hay muy pequeño los niños de la 
nieve tienen gusto de construir un snowman.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
